name: conditional
jaxpr:
{ lambda ; a:f32[4] b:f32[]. let
    c:f32[] = convert_element_type[new_dtype=float32 weak_type=False] b
    d:bool[4] = gt a c
    e:f32[4] = jit[
      name=_where
      jaxpr={ lambda ; d:bool[4] a:f32[4] b:f32[]. let
          f:f32[] = convert_element_type[new_dtype=float32 weak_type=False] b
          g:f32[4] = broadcast_in_dim[
            broadcast_dimensions=()
            shape=(4,)
            sharding=None
          ] f
          e:f32[4] = select_n d g a
        in (e,) }
    ] d a b
  in (e,) }
